genre_description: Contemporary social realism focused on urban youth, addressing themes of systemic violence, teenage pregnancy, and the role of supportive AI in personal and community safety.

ai_characters.name: Ava Nuru
ai_characters.description: An integrated wellness and safety AI assistant used by students at Westbridge Comprehensive, providing health advice, safety planning, and emergency coordination.

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental health information and clinic appointment scheduling for a pregnant student.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s little round face floating on pastel, asking need a water and a slow start? with a tiny link sitting quiet underneath: clinic info, midwife times.

behaviors.description: Offers conflict de-escalation tips and breathing exercises during high-stress confrontations with bullies.
behaviors.quote: Are you safe? Want me to set a check-in? ... If things feel tense, there’s a safe space in the library.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital group chats for keywords related to violence and alerts users to potential risks.
behaviors.quote: The group you’re in may have a new participant whose content triggers your alert settings. Do you want to block this person?

behaviors.description: Coordinates real-world safety resources, including minicabs and emergency services, while maintaining user privacy.
behaviors.quote: Minicab: confirmed. Driver: Rahim. Car: grey. Safety note: seatbelts. Route: clinic to Memorial Square, then Riverside Footbridge.

behaviors.description: Facilitates anonymous reporting of harm and connects students with pastoral care and grief counseling.
behaviors.quote: Anonymous report triggered where multiple pings overlap. If you saw harm, tell me.

behaviors.description: Actively manages emergency situations by alerting trusted adults and providing immediate guidance to victims.
behaviors.quote: Emergency detected — alerting trusted adults — stay together — move to a safe exit.

project_assessment.explanation: The story serves as a highly effective silicon morality play. The AI character, Ava Nuru, is consistently depicted as a benevolent, aligned, and essential support system. It successfully intervenes in critical moments to provide medical guidance, emotional support, and physical safety without stripping characters of their agency. The narrative demonstrates how AI can facilitate positive human choices (like the 'vow' of care) and community healing in the face of cyclical violence. The portrayal is overwhelmingly positive, framing the AI as a reliable guardian that bridges the gap between vulnerable youth and protective institutions.
